New Records: Shreyas Iyer scored 128 not out, his fourth ODI century
KL Rahul scored 102, reaching his century in 62 balls
Highest fourth-wicket stand in World Cup history (208 runs)
India scored 410/4, the third-highest total in the event
Key Match Events: Clinical victory by India despite Dutch bowlers' efforts
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma praised the team's performance and resilience
Shreyas Iyer reflected on his performance and confidence boost
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's ninth consecutive win in the group stage
Match held on the Hindu festival of Diwali
Others: Match was a significant milestone for India's World Cup campaign
